text:
A triangular number is a number that is the sum of all of the natural numbers up to a certain number. For example, 10 is a triangular number because. The first 25 triangular numbers are:0, 1, 3, 6, 10, 15, 21, 28, 36, 45, 55, 66, 78, 91, 105, 120, 136, 153, 171, 190, 210, 231, 253, 276, 300.
formula_1.
